item.text:
The technology that we are looking to use and to integrate into the forthcoming EU application.

The basic architecture is for their to be a federated network of hyperlocal servers, together with supporting infrastructure (some of which may be centralised) - where supporting has to be "contingently supportive" - as in it's nice to have but not essential.

The notion at this stage is to provide robust cryptographic federation at the server-to-server level, with an encouragement for individuals to clone this architecture, while for local communities we provide simple and more open federated architectures.
